title: Brad Pitt steps out in LA after ex Angelina Jolie revealed she felt 'pretty broken' after split
text:
Hi ex wife Angelina Jolie has been on a whirlwind international promotional tour for her Disney film Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil, which hits theaters on Friday.

And on Wednesday, Brad Pitt was spotted stepping out in Los Angeles while rocking a casual look.

The 55-year-old movie star left his office just days after Angelina said that it took a lot of inner strength for her to return to acting because she felt 'pretty broken' following 'coming off a few years of difficulty.'

Casual day: Brad Pitt was spotted stepping out in Los Angeles while rocking a casual look

The Ad Astra actor donned dark wash denim bottoms with sporting a long-sleeved white shirt, adding a gray T-shirt on top for his Wednesday afternoon outing.

The Once Upon A Time In Hollywood actor, who hit the pavement in white sneakers, carried a book and a bottle of water in his hand.

The handsome star sported sunglasses with his long tresses in a deep side part while rocking a goatee.

Angelina, who reprises the role of the title character in Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil, said it wasn't easy returning to acting following a four-year break.

Stepping out: The Ad Astra actor donned dark wash denim bottoms with sporting a long-sleeved white shirt, adding a gray T-shirt on top

The 55-year-old movie star left his office just days after Angelina said that it took a lot of inner strength for her to return to acting because she felt 'pretty broken' following 'coming off a few years of difficulty;' Angelina pictured on October 9, 2019 at the London premiere of Maleficent

The 44-year-old movie star said of her returning to Maleficent: 'It was a tough time. I'd been coming off a few years of difficulty, and I was not feeling very strong. In fact, I was feeling pretty broken,' she said to People.

Adding: 'It took me a moment to feel the strength of [Maleficent] again.'

During her four year break from acting, Angelina split from Brad following a 12-year relationship and six children.

In character: Angelina, who reprises the role of the title character in Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil, said it wasn't easy returning to acting following a four year break

The way they were: During her four year break from acting, Angelina split from Brad following a 12-year relationship and six children

The movie stars, who met in 2004 while filming Mr. And Mrs. Smith, share six children together: sons Maddox, 18, Pax, 15, and Knox, 11, and daughters Zahara, 14, Shiloh, 13, and Vivienne, 11.

They married in August 2014 after 10 years together but Angelina filed for divorce in September 2016.

A judge granted them both legal single status while finalizing their divorce.

The former lovebirds have agreed on a custody agreement for their kids and are currently sorting out property and finances, specifically who gets Miraval, their French winery and the place they tied the knot.

According to The Blast, Brad filed documents to the court asking to appoint a private judge to enable their discussions to continue, a request the star agreed with.

The LA County Court agreed, as long as the pair paid for the judge's time themselves, and a stipulation order was put in place to 'Extend Appointment of Privately Compensated Temporary Judge.'

Throwback: The movie stars, who met in 2004 while filming Mr. And Mrs. Smith; pictured in the 2005 film

Former loves: They married in August 2014 after 10 years together but Angelina filed for divorce in September 2016; pictured November 5, 2015 in Hollywood

She told Madame Figaro magazine her split from Brad was 'a complicated moment' and that she 'didn't recognize herself anymore.'

Angelina said the moment when her 'relationship was coming to an end' was when she 'had lost' herself a bit.

On the separation: 'I felt a deep and genuine sadness, I was hurt,' and that she felt 'smaller, almost insignificant, even if it wasn't necessarily obvious.'

Strength: The 44-year-old movie star said of her returning to Maleficent: 'It was a tough time. I'd been coming off a few years of difficulty, and I was not feeling very strong. In fact, I was feeling pretty broken,' she said to People; pictured with her kids (from left to right) Vivienne, Angelina, Zahara, Shiloh and Knox

In 2016, Brad and Maddox allegedly got into an argument on a private jet while on the way to Los Angeles, which led to Angelina filing for divorce that year. Brad was later cleared of any wrongdoing, reports the magazine.

Maddox has chosen not to have a relationship with Brad even though Angelina has tried to mend fences, according to Us Weekly.

'Maddox hasn't been receptive, And for Brad, it's a tremendous loss.'

Maddox, who is at college in South Korea, was adopted by Angelina in March 2002 in Cambodia; Brad later adopted him when the actors began their relationship.

Brad was noticeably absent when Angelina took Maddox to drop him off at the Yonsei University in Seoul where he is studying biochemistry.

Us Weekly also claimed that Brad is estranged from Pax, 15. And a source noted that with Maddox overseas, Brad feels he can work on his relationship with Pax.
